globalRules: Check for security vulnerabilities including SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF attacks
Ensure proper error handling in all async functions
Verify that sensitive data (passwords, tokens, API keys) is never logged
Check for memory leaks in long-running processes
Ensure API endpoints have proper rate limiting and authentication
Follow TypeScript best practices and type safety
Check for performance issues like N+1 queries or inefficient algorithms
Verify that all user inputs are properly validated and sanitized
Ensure proper logging without exposing sensitive information
Check for code duplication and suggest refactoring opportunities
